name: semiconducting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the properties of a semiconductor (= a material or device that allows electricity to move through it more easily when its temperature increases): Photons in sunlight hit the solar panel and are absorbed by semiconducting materials. The addition of minute quantities of aluminium to silicon will increase its semiconducting properties. See
semiconductor
More examplesFewer examplesThe team measured the semiconducting properties of metal oxides at high temperatures.Ordinary nitrogen gas, solidified at high pressure, turns into a semiconducting solid.These look like leaves but are close-ups of semiconducting polymers used in solar panels.
